remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 2nd paragraph on p. 114. ` Y ` represents t_2.  In their notation, we prove t ` \/ ` t_2 = t ` \/ ` r.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdleme10t.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme10t.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme10t.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme10t.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme10t.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme10t.y $e |- Y = ( ( R .\/ T ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme10tN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ R e. A /\ ( T e. A /\ -. T .<_ W ) ) -> ( T .\/ Y ) = ( T .\/ R ) ) $.
